message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.GR 

The paper deals with action recognition from 3D joint positions, which is a common problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves a kernel approximation for scalability, which is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves theoretical analysis of the proposed method, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The experiments involve benchmark datasets for 3D action recognition, which is a common topic in multimedia (cs.MM) and graphics (cs.GR).
